attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a result of the catastrophic loss of the records of 25 million people by HMRC, we, the undersigned, have no confidence in the government's competence. We suspect we are not alone. We therefore ask the Prime Minister to seek a dissolution of Parliament and call an immediate General Election so that the British people may have the opportunity to show their trust for and confidence in the government. Or not.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
